header_text: Your boss is talking about one of your role models in your field of work during a meeting, and she asks if anyone knows about their work. You quickly raise your hand in front of everyone, and your colleagues turn to you. You realize that you feel confident.

elements.Text: Are you embarrassed that you raised your hand?

elements.name: Your boss is talking about one of your role models in your field of work during a meeting, and she asks if anyone knows about their work.
